name: Richard MICKMAN, Respondent v. Elaine MICKMAN, Petitioner

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
parties: Richard MICKMAN, Respondent v. Elaine MICKMAN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of February, 2016, the Application for Extraordinary Relief and Stay/Supersedeas of All Proceedings and the Petition for Leave to Clarify are DENIED.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
133 A.3d 3
Richard MICKMAN, Respondent v. Elaine MICKMAN, Petitioner.
No. 167 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 24, 2016.
